::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod runs out of the ship, shooting at every Pred he can, untill he's
next to Kluster.
"Lets have some fun. Beast mode!" Hot Rod transformes to his "bat" mode.
"Watch this Kluster!" Hot Rod starts picking up rocks, and dropping them
on the Predicons.
"Smashing. Positivly Smashing." Says Hot Rod.
